Interface ResearcherM

public interface ResearcherM
An interface that introduces the researcher to the system.

    • addPaper

      void addPaper(String topic, String title, String authors, String journal, int pages, String date)
      Adds a new research paper with the specified topic, title, authors, journal, number of pages, and date.
      Parameters:
      topic - topic of paper
      title - title of paper
      authors - authors of paper
      journal - journal that published paper.
      pages - count of pages
      date - date when was published
